sentences.en: ' Oceania,'tis for thee'gave way to lighter music.
sentences.cn: 现在轻音乐替代了《这是为了你, 大洋国》.

sentences.en: " Hail Mary full of Grace the Lord is with thee.
sentences.cn: “ 万福玛利亚,满被圣宠者,主与尔偕焉.

sentences.en: " I have left thee to the scarlet letter, " replied Roger Chillingworth.
sentences.cn: “ 我把你留给了红字, ” 罗杰-齐灵渥斯回答说.

sentences.en: " Wilt thou let me be at peace, if I once tell thee? "
sentences.cn: “ 要是我告诉你,你肯不肯让我安静安静? ”

sentences.en: Ay ! Louder , Vengeance, much louder, and still she will scarcely hear thee.
sentences.cn: 是的,声音大一点, 复仇女神.声音很大了, 可她仍然没听见.

sentences.en: Canst thou tell me, my child, who made thee? "
sentences.cn: 你能不能告诉我, 我的孩子, 是谁造出了你? ”

sentences.en: Doth this bring thee no comfort? "
sentences.cn: 这一点难道还不能给你带来慰藉 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Doth thy sentence bind thee to wear the token in thy sleep?
sentences.cn: 判决是不是规定你睡觉时也要佩着那标记?

sentences.en: Follow love , and it will flee ; flee love , and it will follow thee.
sentences.cn: 求之不得, 不求自来.

sentences.en: He would sign off each week with the catch-phrase, "I'llsee thee!"
sentences.cn: 每周结束节目时他都会说那句经典的话，“下周见！”。
我封你为兰斯洛特骑士。

sentences.en: If thou so choose, it will bear thee back again.
sentences.cn: 只要你愿意, 它还可以把你再送回去.

sentences.en: Prepared each day for thee and me.
sentences.cn: 每日精心备餐，专为我和你。

sentences.en: Tell me, then, what thou art, and who sent thee hither? "
sentences.cn: 是推把你打发到这儿来的? ”

sentences.en: The cake was done to a fare - thee - well.
Trust thyself only, and another shall not betray thee.
sentences.cn: 只有信任你自己, 别人才不会出卖你.
